page.title: 03LIFE STYLES IN OTLEY AREA
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF.... {D. JONES-}Advisor of design(Bradford) 7am-gets up 8am- breakfast(toast, coffee), 8.40am-goes to work, 9.20am- arrives at main office. He looks at letters, 9.30am-arrives at a middle school(Birkenshaw)-interviews teachers for a job.The rest of the morning he has a talk with head about design in school ,lunches at school 2pm-has a meeting about a craft teacher. 3pm- goes to own office in Burley, where he finds out what he is doing next day. 4.30pm- he holds a design course for teachers,in Burley.7pm- holds design club.9pm- he goes home;Bed at 12pm. {MRS.LORD}-OAP.7am- gets up,has break- fast (bread,honey),goes shopping. When home, makes lunch (meat dish) 12pm- has lunch.After lunch washes up. In afternoon plays bowls 5pm- has tea.6pm reads book 10.30pm- bed.
